name: The Demon Inside
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Years after his release from jail, Sam Parsons has rebuild his life with his wife Courtney and their young daughter Harper. But when supernatural occurrences start to happen in the house, Sam fears for his family's safety; he calls in a group of renown ghost hunters to remove the paranormal entity, but they uncover the presence is actually a demon that has been pursuing Sam his whole life.

short_description: A reformed convict has rebuilt a peaceful, quaint life for him and his family in a small suburban town. But a serious of strange supernatural events begin to occur and it become quite clear that a malevolent spirit has descended upon him and his family.
